code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useMoviePerActor}from'../hooks/useActors';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MovieList=()=>{const{data:moviesPerActor,loading,error}=useMoviePerActor();const[selectedActor,setSelectedActor]=useState(null);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Movies Per Actor"}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]}),moviesPerActor&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{onChange:e=>setSelectedActor(e.target.value),defaultValue:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Select Actor"}),moviesPerActor&&Object.keys(moviesPerActor).map(actor=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:actor,children:actor},actor))]}),selectedActor&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:selectedActor}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:moviesPerActor&&moviesPerActor[selectedActor].map((movie,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:movie},idx))})]})]});};export default MovieList;
